DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to compare the frequency of suicidality and suicide attempt among HIV patients starting treatment with Efavirenz and with patients starting treatment with other HIV medications.
DOC.brief_title: Suicidality and Suicide Attempt Among HIV Patients on Efavirenz-containing Versus Efavirenz-free Antiretroviral Regimens
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com At least 6 months of enrollment before first prescription Antiretroviral naive No diagnosis of HIV on patient record Age < 12 years
